item.title: How to set up simple website with hugo
item.description: install hugo on arch sudo pacman -S hugo on mint sudo snap install hugo check installed arch: hugo version mint: snap run hugo version create new project hugo new site temp cd temp git init get theme from: https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder git submodule add https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder.git themes/hugo-coder update config.toml with minimal template from ^ comment customCSS, customSCSS, customJS (this is throwing error) run website hugo server customize to my needs new content
